mapper.insert: insert into menu(menu_id, name, price, description, keyword, image, hot, ice, category_id, cafe_id) values (menu_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{price}, #{description}, #{keyword}, #{image}, #{hot}, #{ice}, #{categoryId}, #{cafeId})
mapper.update: update menu set name=#{name}, price=#{price}, description=#{description}, keyword=#{keyword}, image=#{image} where menu_id=#{menuId}
mapper.select: select menu_id, name, price, description, grade, keyword, image, good, click, hot, ice, category_id, cafe_id, sweet, bitter, sour from menu order by #{condition} desc
select menu_id, name, price, description, grade, keyword, image, good, click, hot, ice, category_id, cafe_id, sweet, bitter, sour from menu where cafe_id=#{cafeId}
select menu_id, name, price, description, grade, keyword, image, good, click, hot, ice, category_id, cafe_id, sweet, bitter, sour from menu where category_id=#{categoryId}
select menu_id, name, price, description, grade, keyword, image, good, click, hot, ice, category_id, cafe_id, sweet, bitter, sour from menu where cafe_id=#{cafeId} and category_id=#{categoryId}

select menu_id, name, price, description, grade, keyword, image, good, click, hot, ice, category_id, cafe_id, sweet, bitter, sour from menu where name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or description like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or keyword like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
mapper.update: update menu set good=good+1 where menu_id=#{menuId}
update menu set good=good-1 where menu_id=#{menuId}
update menu set (sweet, bitter, sour)=(select avg(sweet), avg(bitter), avg(sour) from review where menu_id=#{menuId}) where menu_id=#{menuId}
update menu set grade=(select avg(grade) from review where menu_id=#{menuId}) where menu_id=#{menuId}
